works.description:
An image has copied onto google's cache servers without permission. Google search (according to WHOIS information) is infringing on at least one copyright owned by my myself. The original image, to which I own the exclusive copyrights, can be found at http://www.flickr.com/photos/tomtolkien/6276199631 additionally the source file can be viewed at http://farm7.static.flickr.com/6215/6276199631_584a3ecb6e_b.jpg

I am the copyright owner of the digital image being infringed at:
http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:aFhmhzXd-icJ:twitter.com/tomandroyd/statuses/120201959599910913

This letter is official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c)
of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") to effect removal of the
above-reported infringements. I request that you immediately issue a
cancellation message as specified in RFC 1036 for the specified postings and
prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web address, from posting
the infringing photographs to your servers in the future. Please be advised
that law requires you, as a service provider, to "expeditiously remove or
disable access to" the infringing image upon receiving this notice.
Noncompliance will result in a loss of immunity for liability under the DMCA.

If service providers do not investigate and remove or disable the infringing
material this immunity is lost. Therefore, in order for you to remain immune
from a copyright infringement action you will need to investigate and
ultimately remove or otherwise disable the infringing material from your
servers with all due speed should the direct infringer, your client, not
comply immediately.

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained
of here is not authorized by me, the copyright holder, or the law. The
information provided here is accurate to the best of my knowledge. I swear
under penalty of perjury that I am the copyright holder.

I note that sufficient information has been provided above for a valid DMCA which has been verified by my attorney.


Yours sincerely,

/s/ Thomas Tolkien
